biotools.summary: Perform short linear motif analyses of protein interaction networks by integrating motif discovery and search tools in a network visualization environment. This aims to aid in the discovery of novel short linear motifs, as well as visualisation of the distribution of known motifs.

bioschemas.name: SLiMScape 3
